seller_description: seller Description: Daily face wash for normal to oily skin sensitive skin. This foaming face cleanser removes excess oil while maintaining skin's natural protective barrier & pH. Removes face and eye makeup, dirt, and impurities.Facial cleanser infused with Prebiotic Thermal Water, Ceramide-3, Niacinamide & Glycerin. Suitable for face & hands
review: I decided to repurpose the La Roche-Posay Purifying Foaming Cleanser as a gentle cleaner for my photo frames and mirrors, and it’s been a game-changer! The cleanser removes dust and smudges effortlessly, leaving the surfaces crystal clear without any streaks. The pump dispenser makes it so easy to use, and its mild scent adds a touch of elegance to the task. Although I haven’t applied it to my skin yet, I’m thrilled with how versatile it is for maintaining the shine of my home decor. Highly recommended for anyone looking to think outside the box with their household products!
label: -1 buyers opinion
